items.name: Fireside Chat 1
items.description: Episode one of the Friday Fireside Chat! We discuss the new summer update, updates coming in the future, and other miscellaneous topics!

items.name: Fireside Chat 2
items.description: We discuss some of the most underrated villagers in Animal Crossing New Horizons.

items.name: Fireside Chat 3
items.description: Today Jackie and Jemima discuss the new villagers in New Horizons as well as their thoughts and favorites!
